name: CITY OF PITTSBURGH and UPMC Benefit Management Services, Inc., Petitioners v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (DARWIN), Respondent
name_abbreviation: City of Pittsburgh v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: CITY OF PITTSBURGH and UPMC Benefit Management Services, Inc., Petitioners v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (DARWIN), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of December, 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED, and the matter is remanded for reconsideration in light of City of Pittsburgh and UPMC Benefit Management Services, Inc. v. Workers’ Compensation Appeal Board (Robinson), 620 Pa. 345, 67 A.3d 1194 (2013).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
81 A.3d 882
CITY OF PITTSBURGH and UPMC Benefit Management Services, Inc., Petitioners v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (DARWIN), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 9, 2013.
